OPENCTI_URL.description: The base URL of the OpenCTI instance.

OPENCTI_TOKEN.description: The API token to connect to OpenCTI.

CONNECTOR_LOG_LEVEL.description: The minimum level of logs to display.

CONNECTOR_DURATION_PERIOD.description: The period of time to await between two runs of the connector.

MISP_FEED_SOURCE_TYPE.description: Source type for the MISP feed (`url` or `s3`).

MISP_FEED_URL.description: The URL of the MISP feed (required if `source_type` is `url`).

MISP_FEED_SSL_VERIFY.description: Whether to verify SSL certificates for the feed URL.

MISP_FEED_BUCKET_NAME.description: Bucket Name where the MISP's files are stored

MISP_FEED_IMPORT_FROM_DATE.description: Start date for importing data from the MISP feed.

MISP_FEED_CREATE_REPORTS.description: Whether to create reports from MISP feed data.

MISP_FEED_REPORT_TYPE.description: The type of reports to create from the MISP feed.

MISP_FEED_CREATE_INDICATORS.description: Whether to create indicators from the MISP feed.

MISP_FEED_CREATE_OBSERVABLES.description: Whether to create observables from the MISP feed.

MISP_FEED_CREATE_TAGS_AS_LABELS.description: Whether to convert tags into labels.

MISP_FEED_GUESS_THREATS_FROM_TAGS.description: Whether to infer threats from tags.

MISP_FEED_MARKINGS_FROM_TAGS.description: Whether to infer markings from tags.

MISP_FEED_AUTHOR_FROM_TAGS.description: Whether to infer authors from tags.

MISP_FEED_IMPORT_TO_IDS_NO_SCORE.description: Import data without a score to IDS.

MISP_FEED_IMPORT_UNSUPPORTED_OBSERVABLES.description: Import unsupported observables as plain text.
Whether to import unsupported observables transparently as text.

MISP_FEED_IMPORT_WITH_ATTACHMENTS.description: Whether to import attachments from the feed.

AWS_ENDPOINT_URL.description: URL to specify for compatibility with other S3 buckets (MinIO)

AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID.description: Access key used to access the bucket

AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY.description: Secret key used to access the bucket
